name: Skele-TON Adventure
description:
Note - IF YOU DON'T SEE THE WALLS YOU NEED TO ZOOM OUT OF THE WEB-PAGE.

This is a game that you have to sacrifice your weapon to swap it. So you will drop your old weapon for the new one. This is basically dungeon rogue-like that is not procedural generated.

Controls: 

W - Move Up                             Space - Interact

S - Move Down                        Click - Shoot

A - Move Left

D - Move Right
